842390.name: Fantasy Grounds - Monstrous Characters Vol 2 (Token Pack)
842390.description:
Monstrous Characters, Vol. 2

Make your game more monstrous with Monster Grin's 45 unique new tokens, each usable as PCs, NPCs, mooks, monsters, or bosses!
Nagas, Half-giants, Centaurs, and more are all contained in this pack and will amp up the awesome monster potential for your game.
Utilize Monster Grin's Token Halo System to create different types of teams (red, gold, green, or blue), or even different levels of the same kind of creature (i.e. boss, high, medium, or low level) to help keep track of whats what and whos who and keep your game rockin'!
This token pack includes (ringed in black, blue, gold, green, greyscale, and silver):
  • Female Centaur
  • Female Naga
  • Male Half-Giant
  • Male Quickling
  • Male Tiger Warrior
Conversion by: James Holloway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
